targets.query: SELECT last("server_memory") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SHOW  TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "sku" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/  AND $timeFilter
SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "hardware_type" WHERE "sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/  AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("total_storage_mb") FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT non_negative_derivative("read_latency_ms", 1s)/  non_negative_derivative("reads", 1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND   "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("write_latency_ms", 1s) / non_negative_derivative("writes", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND ("database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ )) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name",database_id::string, "logical_filename"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("rg_read_stall_ms", 1s)/ non_negative_derivative("reads", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

panels.title: Reads IO's queued -  Resource Governance Impact

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("rg_write_stall_ms", 1s)/ non_negative_derivative("reads", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND  "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

panels.title: Write IO's queued -  Resource Governance Impact

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative("read_bytes", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("write_bytes", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/  ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("reads", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND ("database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ OR "database_name" ='tempdb' ) ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

SELECT non_negative_derivative("writes", 1s) FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND ("database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ OR "database_name" ='tempdb' ) ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", "logical_filename"

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("reads"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND database_id > 2) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("reads"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND database_id = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("reads"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND  database_id = 2 ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

panels.title: RBPEX Vs Data Files Reads ( IOPS)

targets.query: SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("writes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND database_id > 2) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("writes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND database_id = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("writes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND  database_id = 2 ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("read_bytes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND  "database_id" >2) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("read_bytes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND   "database_id" = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("write_bytes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND  "database_id" = 2 ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

panels.title: RBPEX Vs Data Files Read Bytes/sec

targets.query: SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("write_bytes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "database_id" >2) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("write_bytes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "database_id" = 0) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

SELECT  non_negative_derivative(sum("write_bytes"),1s)  FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND  "database_id" = 2 ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "database_name", TIME(15s)

panels.title: RBPEX Vs Data Files Write Bytes/sec

targets.query:
SELECT mean("freespace") / mean("tempdbsize") * 100.0 AS PercenttempdbFree
FROM 
(SELECT ("value") AS "freespace" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "counter" = 'Free Space in tempdb (KB)' AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND $timeFilter) )
,
(SELECT ("value") AS "tempdbsize" FROM "sqlserver_performance" WHERE ("sql_instance" =~ /^$InstanceName$/ AND "counter" = 'Data File(s) Size (KB)' AND "database_name" =~ /^$DatabaseName$/ AND "instance" = 'tempdb' AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY "instance")
GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

list.definition: select sql_instance from (select  "sql_instance", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" where  "engine_edition" = 5 and $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance)
list.label: ServerName
list.name: InstanceName
list.query: select sql_instance from (select  "sql_instance", LAST("engine_edition")  from "sqlserver_server_properties" where  "engine_edition" = 5 and $timeFilter  GROUP BY sql_instance)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_db_resource_governance" WITH KEY="database_name"  WHERE $timeFilter  AND sql_instance =~  /$InstanceName/
list.name: DatabaseName
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES  FROM "sqlserver_db_resource_governance" WITH KEY="database_name"  WHERE $timeFilter  AND sql_instance =~  /$InstanceName/
